response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Our product is not just an item; it's a key to unlocking new possibilities and enhancing your business significantly. Given its worth to you, we believe it's valued at $800,000. To ensure we're maximizing its value while considering your budget, I'm offering this exceptional piece at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and includes a comprehensive support package to help you integrate and optimize its use within your operations. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
